column5: YDX Partnership with Liquid Media Group YVR Early in May the Company announced the collaboration agreement with Liquid Media Group Ltd Liquid Nasdaq YVR The main focus of the agreement is to allow Liquid to leverage YDX technology across their IP portfolio bringing classic and future titles to Arkave Virtual Reality VR Arenas Arkave VR in Canada the United States and Brazil as well as the Game On Festival experiences allowing players to engage with games in a whole new way
